title: Hayden's Garden
description: Hayden's Garden is an engaging story about a young boy who lives on a farm with His Mom and Dad, Grandma and Grandpa and lots of animals.Wanting to help the family, he decides he would like to grow a vegatable garden. things don't go quite as planned but with the help of his family and the local farm stand he has his garden.
author: Brenda M. Spalding
